name: God's Advocate [Demo]
description:
This game is a soft launch of the full product, the full game will look much better and have more story made for Spooktober VN Jam 2021

How far would you go if it meant you could get your heart’s desire? While Akira Kobayashi, a depressed head geneticist, is trying to battle her own personal demons, she stumbles upon a secret experiment within the confines of her workplace. When she discovers that the experiment has a closer connection to her than she could ever dream of, it leaves her battling with her morals and her selfish wants.

Length: 12k words

Endings: 2

Genre: Visual novel, Sci-Fi, Horror

Spooktober 2021 submission

Rated T for:

  • Child with cuts and bruises
  •  Main character with depression
  •  Pills

Next update will include:

  • Spelling Errors
  • Add Missing Music and SFX
  • Sprite fixes
  • A certain characters gender being corrected
  • Glitch where a certain order ends the game early

People involved: 

Team Name: callaiumstudios

Programmer: Esper

Main Writer/Supporting Artist: Brooke 

Sprite Artist/Supporting Writer:Brianna 

CG Artist: Namizo 

Sprite Shading: Milly

Backgrounds: Sims 4 edited by Esper
